Gotron got on a computer and checked the Iron Fist for attackers. Burning H=
ammer came up behind him and planted a hand around his neck. Gotron grabbed=
 a gun, but Burning Hammer knocked it away. He pulled out a knife and put i=
t to Gotron's neck, letting the dull rusty blade come inches before cutting=
 him. Burning Hammer lets go.

Burning Hammer: Now you know how easy it is =
to be assassinated, so don't ever think about betraying the Alliance.

Gotr=
on: You didn't have to do it like that! And if you weren't an Alliance memb=
er, then I would have chopped you to pieces! And what about you? You are mo=
re apt to betray the Alliance than me!

Gotron rubbed his neck while Burnin=
g Hammer laughed almost biker thug like.

Burning Hammer: You have never se=
en me in combat, not yet, but I just wanted to teach you a lesson! Play on =
your little computer there, because sometimes, life is short, assassination=
 is what dramatically changes the fate of the world, junior!

Burning Hamme=
r goes to his quarters.

Gotron: (Bleep)ing idiotic maniac, one day I'll ge=
t him. One day...
